actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 relating to an urban mobility project for New York City, New York.

summary.text: Amends the Intermodal surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to deauthorize improvements on Miller highway in New York City, New York, and instead authorize improvements to the 72nd Street station of the Interborough Rapid Transit line located at the intersection of West 72nd Street and Broadway, in an equal amount.

titles.title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 relating to an urban mobility project for New York City, New York.
